description: A minimal, elegant devotional app designed for spiritual growth, combining Bible study, AI-powered sermon recording, fasting tracking, and personal reflection.

typography.sans_serif: SF Pro Display / System Sans (Modern, UI elements)
typography.serif: New York / Georgia (Elegant, Scripture and Headings)

visual_identity.ui_elements: Rounded corners (3xl), backdrop blurs, iOS-native navigation patterns, gradient overlays for imagery, and subtle glow effects.

home_dashboard.personalized_greeting: Dynamic based on time of day.
home_dashboard.verse_of_the_day: Featured card with image backgrounds and sharing/saving actions.
home_dashboard.discovery: Suggested devotionals and preview of recent user notes.

bible_reader.customization: Adjustable font sizes and dark-theme optimized reading surface.

sermon_recording_ai.recorder: Real-time audio recording with a dynamic frequency visualizer (Canvas API).
sermon_recording_ai.ai_processing: Uses Gemini 2.5 Flash to transcribe audio and generate bulleted theological summaries from sermon recordings.
sermon_recording_ai.library: Archive of past sermons with duration, date, and categorized insights.

fasting_center.timer: Active stopwatch for custom fasts displaying Hours:Minutes:Seconds.
fasting_center.community_groups: Group-based fasting with a social feed for scriptures, prayer requests, and milestones.
fasting_center.social_features: Likes and sharing for feed items; group discovery and management.

journey_growth_tracker.journaling: Full-screen editor with categories (Devotion, Prayer, Life Lesson) and activity logging.
journey_growth_tracker.metrics: Dashboard for daily streaks, prayer minutes, and activity counts.
journey_growth_tracker.visualizations: Weekly consistency bar graphs for devotional habits.
journey_growth_tracker.timeline: Chronological activity log across all app features (Sermons, Fasting, Journaling).

technical_stack.ux_patterns: Single Page Application (SPA) with state-driven view switching, responsive mobile-first container, and native-feeling bottom navigation.

navigation_structure.sub_navigation: Nested view states for Detail views, Editors, and Trackers within each primary tab.
